message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8750.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $9200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. My final counteroffer is $8800.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $9100. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. My final counteroffer is $8900.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $9000. This is my final offer.
